关于 Koodo Reader 您可能关心的东西: What you should know about Koodo Reader?
Koodo Reader 是一个免费开源的电子书阅读器，诞生于2020年春，因为: Koodo Reader is a free and powerful eBook reader, born in 2020 spring during  the outbreak of Coronavirus COVID-19.
对于 Mac，Koodo Reader 要求及以上系统，对于 Windows，要: For Mac, Koodo Reader requires macOS 10.10 or later. For Windows, Windows 7 and later are supported.
如何备份和恢复数据？: How to backup and restore data?
点击右上角的 “备份和恢复” 按钮按照提示一步步操作就可以了，备份的文件以 zi: To backup and restore data, just click the Backup and Restore button in the top-right corner and follow the instruction

每个版本 Koodo Reader 的更新日志: What's new about each version of Koodo Reader
简单易用的 EPUB 笔记系统，让你在学习时效率倍增，充分体验电子化学习的乐趣。: Add annotations and notes to improve reading efficiency. Export notes and have them anywhere, so you can check them on the go
Koodo Reader 完美支持Windows，macOS，Linux 和 网: Powerful parsing engine that perfectly supports epub, pdf , mobi and txt, Koodo Reader support Window, macOS, Linux and Web
备份自己的图书、笔记、进度，以及所有你能想到的一切！永远不用担心数据丢失，只需打: Export book files, notes, reading progress, and anything to a .zip file! and people could use our icon manager app to import it with one click.
Koodo Reader 率先在业界实现了主流平台的全面支持，让你无需再在各个软: No matter on a browser or a desktop app, we try our best to provide you with refreshing and comfortable reading experience.
几十种语言即时在线翻译: Koodo Reader works great on all mainstream platform
从上千本书中快速搜索到你寻找的图书: Lightning fast seach inside thousands of books at once.
一键将你喜欢的文字添加到书摘中永久保存: Easily save any sentences into digests with one click
使用书签标记你的阅读进度，快速定位到之前的位置: Use bookmarks to flag your reading progress
Koodo Reader 将永久免费，并不断添加更多功能: Koodo Reader will always be free to use, with frequent updates.
